## ActionMethod interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ActionMethod<GParams extends any[] = []> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isActive(attrs)](./core-types.actionmethod.isactive.md) | Determines whether the command is currently in an active state. |
|  [isEnabled(attrs)](./core-types.actionmethod.isenabled.md) | Returns true when the command can be run and false when it can't be run. |
